org.springframework.data.neo4j.fieldaccess
Interface FieldAccessorFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConvertingNodePropertyFieldAccessorFactory, CrossStoreNodeDelegatingFieldAccessorFactory, DelegatingFieldAccessorFactory, DynamicPropertiesFieldAccessorFactory, IdFieldAccessorFactory, NodeDelegatingFieldAccessorFactory, PropertyFieldAccessorFactory, QueryFieldAccessorFactory, ReadOnlyRelatedToCollectionFieldAccessorFactory, RelatedToCollectionFieldAccessorFactory, RelatedToSingleFieldAccessorFactory, RelatedToViaCollectionFieldAccessorFactory, RelatedToViaSingleFieldAccessorFactory, RelationshipDelegatingFieldAccessorFactory, RelationshipNodeFieldAccessorFactory, TransientFieldAccessorFactory, TraversalFieldAccessorFactory
public interface FieldAccessorFactory

Factory interface for a single field / field accessor. Provides means to check if a certain field is eligible for this factory and also a factory method to create the field accessor.

Since:
12.09.2010
Author:
Michael Hunger

Method Summary
 boolean accept(Neo4jPersistentProperty f)
           
 FieldAccessor forField(Neo4jPersistentProperty f)
           
 

Method Detail

accept

boolean accept(Neo4jPersistentProperty f)
Parameters:
f - field to check
Returns:
true if this factory is responsible for creating a accessor for this field

forField

FieldAccessor forField(Neo4jPersistentProperty f)
Parameters:
f - the field to create an accessor for
Returns:
a field accessor for the field or null if none can be created
